root.name: Sam & Max Episode 2: Situation: Comedy
root.description: Plot. Talk show host Myra Stump has gone berzerk! Sam Max head down to the WARP TV studio to find out why she's holding her audience hostage. But getting onto Myra's stage isn't going to be easy. First the Freelance Police will have to prove they're worthy of fifteen minutes of fame. Unfortunately from Sam Max, Myra only allows big stars to be on the show. This causes Sam Max to star in a television show, obtain a record deal and be involved in a scandal. The set of Midtown Cowboys. Sam Max star on the television show called ''Midtown Cowboys'' a comedy show were they must attempt to disguise a cow from their landlord, Philo Pennyworth. They show includes both gross out humor and advertisement sneakily said by actors to be purported as lines. A parody of American Idol, called Embarrassing Idol where Sam competes for a recording contact against former child star Peepers. Luckily Max is a judge on the show, along with Specs and Whizzer. Sybil Pandemik has also changed jobs to a tabloid reporting on Aliens and Bosco now is disguised as an English man.
